languages.text: {n}Вы пытаетесь дотянуться до разрозненных мыслей провидцев, но ваша психика едва справляется даже с разумами вменяемых эльдаров. Вас затягивает все глубже в водоворот чужих воспоминаний — сын, бой и смерть, искусство, столетия прожитых жизней... Боль. Боль. Боль. Боль. Все смешалось. Где прошлое, а где настоящее? Будущего... нет. Глаза закрыты, но могут видеть — Та, Что Жаждет уже точит стальные когти и готовится к пиршеству. Нет. Нет... Не-е-т!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь дотянуться до разрозненных мыслей провидцев, но ваша психика едва справляется даже с разумами вменяемых эльдар. Вас затягивет все глубже в водоворот чужих воспоминаний — сын, бой и смерть, искусство, столетия прожитых жизней... Боль. Боль. Боль. Боль. Все смешалось. Где прошлое, а где настоящее? Будущего... нет. Глаза закрыты, но могут зрить — Та, Что жаждет, уже точит стальные когти и готовится к пиршетсву. Нет. Нет... Не-е-т!{/n}

languages.text: {n}You try to reach the Farseers' disorganised thoughts, but even sane Aeldari minds would be too much for your psyche to handle. You are drawn ever deeper into the vortex of foreign memories: a son, a battle, death, art, lives that spanned centuries... Pain. Pain. Pain. Pain. Everything is a blur. Which way is the past? Which way is the future? If there even is a future... which there isn't. The eyes, though closed, can see... She Who Thirsts sharpening her steel claws as she prepares to feast. No. No — nooo!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь дотянуться до разрозненных мыслей провидцев, но ваша психика едва справляется даже с разумами вменяемых эльдаров. Вас затягивает все глубже в водоворот чужих воспоминаний — сын, бой и смерть, искусство, столетия прожитых жизней... Боль. Боль. Боль. Боль. Все смешалось. Где прошлое, а где настоящее? Будущего... нет. Глаза закрыты, но могут видеть — Та, Что Жаждет уже точит стальные когти и готовится к пиршеству. Нет. Нет... Не-е-т!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You try to reach the Farseers' disorganised thoughts, but even sane Aeldari minds would be too much for your psyche to handle. You are drawn ever deeper into the vortex of others' memories: a son, a battle, death, art, lives that spanned centuries... Pain. Pain. Pain. Pain. Everything's a blur. Which way is the past? Which way is the future? That's if there is a future... which there isn't. The eyes, though closed, can see — see Her Who Thirsts sharpen her steel claws as she prepares to feast. No. No — nooo!{/n}

You are drawn ever deeper into the vortex of others' memories: a son, a battle, death, art, lives that spanned centuries... Pain. Pain. Pain. Pain. Everything's a blur. Which way is the past? Which way is the future? That's if there is a future... which there isn't. The eyes, though closed, can see — see Her Who Thirsts sharpen her steel claws as she prepares to feast. No. No — nooo!{/n}

Which way is the future? If there even is a future... which there isn't. The eyes, though closed, can see... She Who Thirsts sharpening her steel claws as she prepares to feast. No. No — nooo!{/n}

You are drawn ever deeper into the vortex of foreign memories: a son, a battle, death, art, lives that spanned centuries... Pain. Pain. Pain. Pain. Everything is a blur. Which way is the past? Which way is the future? If there even is a future... which there isn't. The eyes, though closed, can see... She Who Thirsts sharpening her steel claws as she prepares to feast. No. No — nooo!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas alcanzar los pensamientos desorganizados de los videntes, pero tu psique ni siquiera podría resistir el influjo de una mente Aeldari cuerda. Te ves {mf|arrastrado|arrastrada} al ojo de un vórtice de recuerdos ajenos: un hijo, una batalla, muerte, arte, vidas que abarcan siglos... dolor. Dolor. Dolor. Dolor. Todo se vuelve borroso. ¿Por dónde se va al pasado? ¿Hacia dónde va el futuro? Si es que existe siquiera un futuro... que no es el caso. Aunque cerrados, los ojos aún pueden ver... La Sedienta afila sus aceradas garras y se prepara para el festín. No. No... ¡nooo!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to reach the Farseers' disorganised thoughts, but even sane Aeldari minds would be too much for your psyche to handle. You are drawn ever deeper into the vortex of foreign memories: a son, a battle, death, art, lives that spanned centuries... Pain. Pain. Pain. Pain. Everything is a blur. Which way is the past? Which way is the future? If there even is a future... which there isn't. The eyes, though closed, can see... She Who Thirsts sharpening her steel claws as she prepares to feast. No. No — nooo!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas alcanzar los pensamientos desorganizados de los videntes, pero tu psique ni siquiera podría resistir el influjo de una mente Aeldari cuerda. Te ves {mf|arrastrado|arrastrada} al ojo de un vórtice de recuerdos ajenos: un hijo, una batalla, muerte, arte, vidas que abarcan siglos... dolor. Dolor. Dolor. Dolor. Todo se vuelve borroso. ¿Por dónde se va al pasado? ¿Hacia dónde va el futuro? Si es que existe siquiera un futuro... que no es el caso. Aunque cerrados, los ojos aún pueden ver... La Sedienta afila sus aceradas garras y se prepara para el festín. No. No... ¡nooo!».{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは先見司の乱れた思考を理解しようと試みるが、普通のアエルダリの考え方でさえ、あなたの精神ではついていくことができない。あなたは異質な記憶の渦にどんどん深く引き込まれていく。息子、戦い、死、芸術、何世紀にもわたる人生…痛み、痛み、痛み、痛み。すべてがぼんやりとしている。過去はどこに？未来はどこにある？そもそも未来などは…ないのだ。その目は、閉じられていても、見えるのだ…かの渇きたる女がその鋼鉄の爪を研ぎ澄まし、宴の準備をしているのを。よせ。よせ…やめろ！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to reach the Farseers' disorganised thoughts, but even sane Aeldari minds would be too much for your psyche to handle. You are drawn ever deeper into the vortex of foreign memories: a son, a battle, death, art, lives that spanned centuries... Pain. Pain. Pain. Pain. Everything is a blur. Which way is the past? Which way is the future? If there even is a future... which there isn't. The eyes, though closed, can see... She Who Thirsts sharpening her steel claws as she prepares to feast. No. No — nooo!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは先見司の乱れた思考を理解しようと試みるが、普通のアエルダリの考え方でさえ、あなたの精神ではついていくことができない。あなたは異質な記憶の渦にどんどん深く引き込まれていく。息子、戦い、死、芸術、何世紀にもわたる人生…痛み、痛み、痛み、痛み。すべてがぼんやりとしている。過去はどこに？未来はどこにある？そもそも未来などは…ないのだ。その目は、閉じられていても、見えるのだ…かの渇きたる女がその鋼鉄の爪を研ぎ澄まし、宴の準備をしているのを。よせ。よせ…やめろ！{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试图接触先知们混乱的思想，但哪怕这些先知处于清醒的状态，处理他们的思想也远远超出了你的灵能能力范围。你被吸入了这些记忆漩涡的深处：儿子、战争、死亡、艺术、几百年的人生……疼痛，疼痛，疼痛，无尽的疼痛。所有事物化为一片模糊，哪条路是过去？哪条路才是未来？真的有未来吗？……并没有。他们的眼睛虽然被缝上，但依然能看见……饥渴女士正在磨砺钢爪，准备享受盛宴。不，不——不要！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to reach the Farseers' disorganised thoughts, but even sane Aeldari minds would be too much for your psyche to handle. You are drawn ever deeper into the vortex of foreign memories: a son, a battle, death, art, lives that spanned centuries... Pain. Pain. Pain. Pain. Everything is a blur. Which way is the past? Which way is the future? If there even is a future... which there isn't. The eyes, though closed, can see... She Who Thirsts sharpening her steel claws as she prepares to feast. No. No — nooo!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试图接触先知们混乱的思想，但哪怕这些先知处于清醒的状态，处理他们的思想也远远超出了你的灵能能力范围。你被吸入了这些记忆漩涡的深处：儿子、战争、死亡、艺术、几百年的人生……疼痛，疼痛，疼痛，无尽的疼痛。所有事物化为一片模糊，哪条路是过去？哪条路才是未来？真的有未来吗？……并没有。他们的眼睛虽然被缝上，但依然能看见……饥渴女士正在磨砺钢爪，准备享受盛宴。不，不——不要！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous essayez d'accéder aux pensées désordonnées des Grands Prophètes, mais même un esprit aeldari sain serait trop difficile à manipuler pour votre psyché. Vous êtes {mf|happé|happée} plus profondément encore dans le vortex de souvenirs étrangers : un fils, un combat, la mort, de l'art, des vies qui s'étalent sur des siècles entiers... Douleur. Douleur. Douleur. Douleur. Tout est flou. Où est le passé ? Où est le futur ? S'il existe même un futur... ce qui n'est pas le cas. Les yeux, même fermés, voient... L'Assoiffée en train d'aiguiser ses griffes d'acier tandis qu'elle se prépare à festoyer. Non. Non... Noooon !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to reach the Farseers' disorganised thoughts, but even sane Aeldari minds would be too much for your psyche to handle. You are drawn ever deeper into the vortex of foreign memories: a son, a battle, death, art, lives that spanned centuries... Pain. Pain. Pain. Pain. Everything is a blur. Which way is the past? Which way is the future? If there even is a future... which there isn't. The eyes, though closed, can see... She Who Thirsts sharpening her steel claws as she prepares to feast. No. No — nooo!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous essayez d'accéder aux pensées désordonnées des Grands Prophètes, mais même un esprit aeldari sain serait trop difficile à manipuler pour votre psyché. Vous êtes {mf|happé|happée} plus profondément encore dans le vortex de souvenirs étrangers : un fils, un combat, la mort, de l'art, des vies qui s'étalent sur des siècles entiers... Douleur. Douleur. Douleur. Douleur. Tout est flou. Où est le passé ? Où est le futur ? S'il existe même un futur... ce qui n'est pas le cas. Les yeux, même fermés, voient... L'Assoiffée en train d'aiguiser ses griffes d'acier tandis qu'elle se prépare à festoyer. Non. Non... Noooon !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst in die wirren Gedanken der Runenpropheten einzudringen, aber selbst der gesunde Verstand der Aeldari wäre zu viel für deine Psyche. Tiefer und tiefer wirst du in den Strudel fremder Erinnerungen hineingezogen: ein Sohn, eine Schlacht, Tod, Kunst, Leben, die Jahrhunderte andauerten ... Schmerz. Schmerz. Schmerz. Schmerz. Alles ist verschwommen. Wo liegt die Vergangenheit? Wo liegt die Zukunft? Wenn es überhaupt eine Zukunft gibt ... was nicht der Fall ist. Die Augen sind zwar geschlossen, aber sie erkennen ... Sie, die dürstet, schärft ihre stählernen Klauen, während sie sich für ein Festmahl bereit macht. Nein. Nein – neeein!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to reach the Farseers' disorganised thoughts, but even sane Aeldari minds would be too much for your psyche to handle. You are drawn ever deeper into the vortex of foreign memories: a son, a battle, death, art, lives that spanned centuries... Pain. Pain. Pain. Pain. Everything is a blur. Which way is the past? Which way is the future? If there even is a future... which there isn't. The eyes, though closed, can see... She Who Thirsts sharpening her steel claws as she prepares to feast. No. No — nooo!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du versuchst in die wirren Gedanken der Runenpropheten einzudringen, aber selbst der gesunde Verstand der Aeldari wäre zu viel für deine Psyche. Tiefer und tiefer wirst du in den Strudel fremder Erinnerungen hineingezogen: ein Sohn, eine Schlacht, Tod, Kunst, Leben, die Jahrhunderte andauerten ... Schmerz. Schmerz. Schmerz. Schmerz. Alles ist verschwommen. Wo liegt die Vergangenheit? Wo liegt die Zukunft? Wenn es überhaupt eine Zukunft gibt ... was nicht der Fall ist. Die Augen sind zwar geschlossen, aber sie erkennen ... Sie, die dürstet, schärft ihre stählernen Klauen, während sie sich für ein Festmahl bereit macht. Nein. Nein – neeein!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ötesezen'in dağınık düşüncelerine ulaşmaya çalışıyorsun ancak ruh gücün, aklı başında Aeldari zihinleriyle başa çıkmaya yetmiyor. Yabancı hatıralar girdabının daha da derinlerine çekiliyorsun: Bir oğul, savaş, ölüm, sanat, asırlara yayılmış hayatlar... Acı... Acı... Acı ve yine acı... Her şey bulanık. Geçmiş hangi tarafta? Gelecek hangi tarafta? Bir gelecek varsa bile... Aslında yok. Gözler, kapalı olsalar dahi görebiliyor. Susayan, ziyafete hazırlanırken çelikten pençelerini biliyor. Olamaz. Hayır... Haaayıırr!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to reach the Farseers' disorganised thoughts, but even sane Aeldari minds would be too much for your psyche to handle. You are drawn ever deeper into the vortex of foreign memories: a son, a battle, death, art, lives that spanned centuries... Pain. Pain. Pain. Pain. Everything is a blur. Which way is the past? Which way is the future? If there even is a future... which there isn't. The eyes, though closed, can see... She Who Thirsts sharpening her steel claws as she prepares to feast. No. No — nooo!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ötesezen'in dağınık düşüncelerine ulaşmaya çalışıyorsun ancak aklı başında Aeldari zihinleriyle başa çıkmak bile ruh gücünün çok ötesinde. Yabancı hatıralar girdabının daha da derinlerine çekiliyorsun: Bir oğul, bir savaş, ölüm, sanat, asırlara yayılmış hayatlar... Acı... Acı... Acı ve yine acı... Her şey bulanık. Hangi taraf geçmişe gidiyor? Hangi yol geleceğe açılıyor? Bir gelecek varsa bile... Ki öyle bir şey yok. Gözler, kapalı olsalar dahi görebiliyorlar. Susayan, ziyafete hazırlanırken çelikten pençelerini biliyor. Olamaz. Hayır... Haaayıırr!{/n}
